title: Aqours’ Live Day 2!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Everyone, come on! Let’s hurry~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>There’s no need to rush. The live isn’t going anywhere, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>But, but, I want to be there as soon as possible! I want to wait there and bask in yesterday’s live afterglow~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu understands, Emma! Lanzhu wants to do it as well! Aqours told me to have fun together with them, after all! So we need to make sure that we’re ready to have fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Can you guys wait a bit? Kasumin would like to fix my bangs~. Kasumin wants to be at my cutest for the concert.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’ll fix it for you, Kasumi-chan. Put a little of this powder on your bangs. It will stay silky smooth.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ayumu-senpaaai~! You do get me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ah, I think I forgot my towel. What should I do.... Maybe I should get one from a convenience store.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Shizuku-san, I brought a spare, so please use it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata brought some too. Tell me if you need more, okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Did you forget yours, Rina? I’ll lend you mine if you do.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you.... but I’ll be fine. I’ve prepared everything. Rina-chan’s board「All Perfect」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay, everyone, let’s cheer for them and have fun today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Let’s liven it up~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
